New Records: Scotty Pippen Jr. got his first career triple-double
Key Match Events: Memphis maintained a lead of at least 20 points through the bulk of the second half
Edey got tangled with Valanciunas leading to double-technicals
Pre-Game Insights: The Wizards are dealing with injuries to key players
Memphis is continually picking up the pace this season putting it in the top 5 in the league
Post-Match Reflections: The Grizzlies beat the Wizards 128-104 for their fourth win in five games
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Grizzlies maintained a double-digit lead through the first half
Memphis continues to dominate the paint against its opponents, averaging 60 points a game inside
Others: Wizards visit Orlando on Sunday, and Grizzlies visit Portland
